abstract: Join us to discuss Helen Schulman's latest book, "This Beautiful Life,'' which imagines a worst-case scenario between two New York City teenagers who encounter each other at a party.
snippet: Join us to discuss Helen Schulman's latest book, "This Beautiful Life,'' which imagines a worst-case scenario between two New York City teenagers who encounter each other at a party.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to all of you who participated in today's discussion. Again, we apologize for the technical hiccups that may have wiped out some comments. Next up, on Tuesday, November 29, we'll talk about Truman Capote's classic, "Breakfast at Tiffany's," which I invite people to reread if it's been a while. -- GB
